name: globalsolaratlas_pvout
title: Photovoltaic power potential
description: Longterm yearly average of daily totals of potential photovoltaic electricity production (kWh/kWp).
details: Longterm yearly average of potential photovoltaic electricity production (PVOUT) in kWh/kWp, covering the period from 1994/1999/2007 (depending on the region) to 2015.

extract_types_info.mean: average potential photovoltaic electricity production (kWh/kWp) per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum potential photovoltaic electricity production (kWh/kWp) per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum potential photovoltaic electricity production (kWh/kWp) per unit of analysis

options.variable_description: potential photovoltaic electricity production in kWh/kWp

extras.citation: Global Solar Atlas. The World Bank Group, 2017, https://globalsolaratlas.info. Accessed 2019-03-04.
